attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"The number 8 has become a menace, which unless stopped could replace 9 and !! 7.
People of britain I urge you to make a stand, no more shall we have 2 fat ladies humiliating our wives at Gala night!
Arise Britain and Hate the 8.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
